description: Allows the mob to perform a damaging knockback that affects all nearby entities.

attack_time.description: The delay after which the knockback occurs (in seconds).

cooldown_time.description: Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again.

duration.description: The duration of the roar (in seconds).

knockback_damage.description: The damage dealt by the knockback roar.

knockback_range.description: The radius (in blocks) of the knockback effect.

knockback_filters.description: The list of conditions another entity must meet to be a valid target to apply knockback to.

damage_filters.description: The list of conditions another entity must meet to be a valid target to apply damage to.

on_roar_end.description: Event that is triggered when the roar ends.
